# FREE Entry-level Cybersecurity Training + Certification Exam

Start your career today!

English  **  | ** 日本語 **  | ** 简体中文 **  | ** Deutsch **  | ** español

## ISC2 Pledges One Million FREE ISC2 Certified in Cybersecurity Courses and
Exams

See yourself in cybersecurity. You don’t need experience — just the passion
and drive to enter a demanding and rewarding field, one that opens limitless
opportunities worldwide.

As part of our commitment to help close the cybersecurity workforce gap and
diversify those working in the field, ISC2 is offering FREE Certified in
Cybersecurity (CC) Online Self-Paced Training and exams to one million people.

**Start Your Journey**  
To participate in the One Million Certified in Cybersecurity program, please
follow these simple steps:

  1. Create an account. If you already have an ISC2 account, sign in.
  2. Complete your ISC2 Candidate application form and select Certified in Cybersecurity as your certification of interest.
  3. Once the application is complete, you’ll become an ISC2 Candidate. It’s free to join and you’ll gain access to Official ISC2 Certified in Cybersecurity Online Self-Paced Training and a code to register for the free certification exam. You will find your access on the Candidate Benefits page.
  4. Upon passing the exam, complete the application form and pay U.S. $50 Annual Maintenance Fee (AMF). Once completed you’ll become a certified member of ISC2 – the world’s largest association of certified cybersecurity professionals – with access to a broad range of professional development resources to help you throughout your career.

Get Started

In order to meet every learner’s needs, we’re also offering two Certified in
Cybersecurity training bundles with special extras. Explore all Certified in
Cybersecurity training options.

* * *

**Advancing DEI in Cybersecurity**  
To encourage diversity, equity and inclusion in the workforce, ISC2 will work
closely with partner organizations as part of this program to reach
populations underrepresented in cybersecurity. We’ve pledged half of the
commitment – 500,000 course enrollments and exams – to this effort.
Organizations serving these groups and interested in becoming a One Million
Certified in Cybersecurity Partner should complete this application.

FAQ's

 **Q: What is ISC2 Certified in Cybersecurity™?**

A: ISC2 Certified in Cybersecurity is a foundational cybersecurity
certification designed to help recipients build a pathway to a rewarding
career in cybersecurity. This entry-level certification will prove to
employers you have the foundational knowledge, skills and abilities necessary
for an entry- or junior-level cybersecurity role. It proves your willingness
and ability to learn and grow on the job. Learn more here.

* * *

**Q: Who should consider participating in this opportunity?**

A: The Certified in Cybersecurity entry-level certification is ideal for:

  * IT professionals
  * Career changers
  * College students 
  * Recent graduates

* * *

**Q: How much work experience is required to earn this certification?**

A: Unlike other ISC2 certifications, there is no work experience requirement
to earn the entry-level Certified in Cybersecurity certification.

* * *

**Q: Why will this certification be different from other foundational
certifications?**

A: We believe a need still exists in our industry for a certification that is
attainable for newcomers and recognizes the growing trend of people entering
the cybersecurity workforce without direct IT experience. Employers need
confidence that when hiring new entrants into the field they have a solid
grasp of the right technical concepts, and a demonstrated aptitude to learn on
the job. Moreover, as an ISC2 certification, the recipient will be an ISC2
member backed by the world’s largest network of certified cybersecurity
professionals helping them continue their professional development and earn
new achievements and qualifications throughout their career.

* * *

**Q: What can I expect from the online self-paced course?**

A: The online self-paced course is a recorded review session that introduces
learners to the content covered in the ISC2 Certified in Cybersecurity
certification exam outline. The review sessions are led by an authorized ISC2
instructor and cover the five domains of the entry-level Certified in
Cybersecurity certification. The sessions are designed specifically to help
learners prepare to take the Certified in Cybersecurity exam. Learners have
access to the course for 180 days. The course is available in English,
Chinese, German, Japanese and Spanish.

* * *

**Q: Can I take the exam without starting or completing the education
course?**

A: Yes, you can take the exam at any time you feel ready.

* * *

**Q: How do I register for the free exam?**

A: After you have become an ISC2 Candidate, you will gain access to a promo
code as part of ISC2 Candidate benefits. Once you obtain the code from the
Candidate Benefits page:

  * Visit https://my.isc2.org/s/ISC2-Pearson to create your exam account with Pearson VUE, global administrator of ISC2 exams.You will be prompted to affirm the accuracy of this information before submitting the form. Upon submission, your account will be created with Pearson VUE and you will be on their site.
  * Select the certification: CC: Certified in Cybersecurity.
  * Select your testing location and schedule your exam.
  * Enter promo code you’ve obtained from the Candidate Benefits page.

Note: The promo code is redeemable for one registration per person only. You
must be an ISC2 Candidate to redeem the code. Once you’re registered to sit
for free using the promo code, all future CC registrations in your name must
be purchased at cost.

* * *

**Q: I already have an ISC2 certification or am an Associate of ISC2. Can I
participate in this free program?**

A: No. This One Million Certified in Cybersecurity pledge is intended to bring
new individuals into the field of cybersecurity and provide them with their
first certification. Therefore, the program is not available for anyone who
already holds an ISC2 certification or the Associate of ISC2 status. However,
if would like to take the CC exam, or course, you may do so by purchasing a CC
bundle.

* * *

**Q: What do I need to know about exam day?**

A: This exam follows all standard ISC2 exam policies and practices, including
rescheduling and special accommodations. Learn more here. It is recommended
that all candidates review these policies and procedures prior to sitting for
the exam.

* * *

**Q: What topics are covered in the course and on the exam?**

A: There are five domains to this certification, listed below. For more
details on the exam, review the ISC2 Certified in Cybersecurity exam outline.

  * Security Principles
  * Business Continuity (BC), Disaster Recovery (DR) & Incident Response Concepts
  * Access Controls Concepts
  * Network Security
  * Security Operations

* * *

**Q: How long is the exam?**

A: The exam contains 100 multiple choice test items in a standard, linear exam
format. There is a two (2) hour maximum administration time that is inclusive
of all optional breaks and information screens.

* * *

**Q: Can I skip a test item on the exam and answer it later?**

A: No. All items must be answered in the order they are presented. You cannot
skip an exam item and return to it later.

* * *

**Q: How will I know if I pass the exam?**

A: You will receive a pass or fail result on-site at the test center upon
completion of the exam. If you pass, you will receive a confirmation email
with your next steps to complete the certification process.

* * *

**Q: If I do not pass the exam the first time, can I take it again for free?**

A: No. You are only permitted one free attempt at the CC exam through the One
Million Certified in Cybersecurity pledge. If you would like to attempt the
exam again, we recommend purchasing a training bundle and exam together. You
can see the available options at Certified in Cybersecurity bundles page.

* * *

**Q: Can I take the exam online?**

A: The entry-level Certified in Cybersecurity certification exam will only be
available in-person at ISC2-authorized Pearson VUE test centers

* * *

**Q: Is the exam available worldwide?**

A: You can find the entry-level Certified in Cybersecurity certification exam
at ISC2-authorized Pearson VUE test centers.

* * *

**Q: Is the exam available in multiple languages?**

A: The entry-level Certified in Cybersecurity certification exam is currently
available in English, Simplified Chinese, German, Japanese, Korean and
Spanish.

* * *

**Q: Can I transfer my free course and/or exam registration to someone else?**

A: No, the course training and corresponding exam registration are issued to
you. You may, however, encourage your peers to take advantage of the One
Million Certified in Cybersecurity initiative by becoming ISC2 Candidates.

* * *

**Q: What are the requirements to maintain the Certified in Cybersecurity
certification after passing the exam?**

A: Certified in Cybersecurity credential holders will need to earn 45 CPE
credits during their three-year certification cycle to maintain the
certification. We recommend earning 15 credits per year. You will also need to
pay an Annual Maintenance Fee to maintain your certification.

* * *

**Q: What is the fee and when do I need to start paying for it?**

A: The Annual Maintenance Fee (AMF) for Certified in Cybersecurity is U.S.
$50. This is due upon certification and annually upon your certification
anniversary.

* * *

**Q: Who can I contact if I still have questions?**

A: If you have additional questions about the exam process or registration,
please contact ExamAdministration@isc2.org. If your questions are regarding
ISC2 membership, please reach out to MemberSupport@isc2.org.

* * *

**Q: As an employer, what does it mean if a job candidate has this
certification?**

A: Those who pass this exam have proven their knowledge, skills and abilities
in the fundamentals of cybersecurity. They have a proficient understanding of
policies and processes and have demonstrated their commitment to further
cybersecurity education and development.

* * *

**Q: Is there an age restriction to take an ISC2 examination?**

A: You must be 16 years old to sit for an ISC2 examination.

* * *

**Q: Why is ISC2 offering an entry-level certification?**

A: Research from ISC2 and others continues to conclude that there is a global
shortage of qualified cybersecurity professionals. While there are many
contributing factors, we believe one solution is to create a certification
that enables candidates – including students, young professionals and career-
changers – to demonstrate to employers their familiarity with foundational
cybersecurity concepts as determined by cybersecurity professionals and
practitioners already in the field.

href=\"https://www.isc2.org/landing/1MCC/german\"\u003eDeutsch\u003c/a\u003e\r\n\u003cstrong\u003e\u0026nbsp;|\u0026nbsp;\u003c/strong\u003e\r\n\u003ca
href=\"https://www.isc2.org/landing/1MCC/spanish\"\u003eespañol\u003c/a\u003e\r\n\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch2\u003eISC2
Pledges One Million FREE ISC2 Certified in Cybersecurity Courses and
Exams\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eSee yourself in cybersecurity. You
don\u0026rsquo;t need experience — just the passion and drive to enter a
demanding and rewarding field, one that opens limitless opportunities
worldwide.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAs part of our commitment to help
close the cybersecurity workforce gap and diversify those working in the
field, ISC2 is offering FREE Certified in Cybersecurity\u0026nbsp;(CC) Online
Self-Paced Training and exams to one million
people.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\r\n\u003cp style=\"padding-
bottom:0;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eStart Your
Journey\u003c/strong\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\r\nTo participate in the One
Million Certified in Cybersecurity program, please follow these simple
steps:\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003col\u003e\r\n \u003cli\u003e\u003ca
href=\"https://my.isc2.org/s/login/SelfRegister?ec=302\u0026startURL=%2Fs%2FCandidate-
Application-Form\"\u003eCreate an account.\u003c/a\u003e If you already have
an ISC2 account, \u003ca href=\"https://my.isc2.org/s/Candidate-Application-
Form\"\u003esign in\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n \u003cli\u003eComplete
your ISC2 Candidate \u003ca href=\"https://my.isc2.org/s/Candidate-
Application-Form\"\u003eapplication form\u003c/a\u003e and select Certified in
Cybersecurity as your certification of interest.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n
\u003cli\u003eOnce the application is complete, you\u0026rsquo;ll become an
ISC2 Candidate. It\u0026rsquo;s free to join and you\u0026rsquo;ll gain access
to Official ISC2 Certified in Cybersecurity Online Self-Paced Training and a
code to register for the free certification exam. You will find your access on
the \u003ca href=\"https://my.isc2.org/s/Candidate-Benefits\"
target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://my.isc2.org/s/Candidate-
Benefits\"\u003eCandidate Benefits\u003c/a\u003e page.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n
\u003cli\u003eUpon passing the exam, complete the application form and pay
U.S. $50 Annual Maintenance Fee (AMF). Once completed you’ll become a
certified member of ISC2 – the world’s largest association of certified
cybersecurity professionals – with access to a broad range of professional
development \u003ca href=\"/members\"\u003eresources\u003c/a\u003e to help you
throughout your career.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ol\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp
class=\"text-center\"\u003e\u003ca class=\"primary-cta\"
href=\"https://my.isc2.org/s/login/SelfRegister?ec=302\u0026startURL=%2Fs%2FCandidate-
Application-Form\"\u003eGet
Started\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eIn order to meet every
learner’s needs, we’re also offering two Certified in Cybersecurity training
bundles with special extras. \u003ca href=\"/landing/cc-bundles\"\u003eExplore
all Certified in Cybersecurity training
options.\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e Advancing DEI in
Cybersecurity\u003c/strong\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e\r\nTo encourage diversity,
equity and inclusion in the workforce, ISC2 will work closely with partner
organizations as part of this program to reach populations underrepresented in
cybersecurity. We\u0026rsquo;ve pledged half of the commitment – 500,000
course enrollments and exams – to this effort. Organizations serving these
groups and interested in becoming a One Million Certified in Cybersecurity
Partner should \u003ca href=\"https://my.isc2.org/s/Partner-Form-New\"
target=\"_blank\"\u003ecomplete this
application\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n"},"sectionDescription":{"value":""},"sectionLink":{"value":{"href":""}},"sectionTitle":{"value":""},"PersonalizeID":{"value":""},"backgroundGradient":null,"contentHexColor":null}},{"uid":"a45d5f50-9f27-4c03-80fa-6c429cd2030c","componentName":"Accordion","dataSource":"/sitecore/content/ISC2/Main/Home/landing/1mcc/Data/accordian","params":{"CacheClearingBehavior":"Clear
on
publish"},"fields":{"description":{"value":""},"title":{"value":""},"accordionSections":[{"id":"ce8e2487-4f08-4ad0-a9c8-f6f97d76e3e2","url":"/landing/1mcc/Data/accordian/Rich-
Text-Accordion-Section","name":"Rich Text Accordion
Section","displayName":"Rich Text Accordion
Section","fields":{"richTextItems":[{"id":"8b84c3eb-6631-4fb0-94a7-eb6ad4b75c81","url":"/landing/1mcc/Data/accordian/Rich-
Text-Accordion-Section/Rich-Text-Accordion-Item","name":"Rich Text Accordion
Item","displayName":"Rich Text Accordion
Item","fields":{"content":{"value":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: What is
ISC2 Certified in
Cybersecurity\u0026trade;?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA:
ISC2 \u003ca href=\"/certifications/cc\"\u003eCertified in
Cybersecurity\u003c/a\u003e is a foundational cybersecurity certification
designed to help recipients build a pathway to a rewarding career in
cybersecurity. This entry-level certification will prove to employers you have
the foundational knowledge, skills and abilities necessary for an entry- or
junior-level cybersecurity role. It proves your willingness and ability to
learn and grow on the job. Learn more \u003ca
href=\"/certifications/cc\"\u003ehere\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: Who should consider participating
in this opportunity?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: The
Certified in Cybersecurity entry-level certification is ideal
for:\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul\u003e\r\n \u003cli\u003eIT
professionals\u003c/li\u003e\r\n \u003cli\u003eCareer
changers\u003c/li\u003e\r\n \u003cli\u003eCollege students \u003c/li\u003e\r\n
\u003cli\u003eRecent graduates\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: How much work experience is
required to earn this
certification?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: Unlike
other ISC2 certifications, there is no work experience requirement to earn the
entry-level Certified in Cybersecurity
certification.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: Why will this certification be
different from other foundational
certifications?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: We believe
a need still exists in our industry for a certification that is attainable for
newcomers and recognizes the growing trend of people entering the
cybersecurity workforce without direct IT experience. Employers need
confidence that when hiring new entrants into the field they have a solid
grasp of the right technical concepts, and a demonstrated aptitude to learn on
the job. Moreover, as an ISC2 certification, the recipient will be an ISC2
member backed by the world\u0026rsquo;s largest network of certified
cybersecurity professionals helping them continue their professional
development and earn new achievements and qualifications throughout their
career.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr /\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ:
What can I expect from the online self-paced
course?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: The online self-
paced course is a recorded review session that introduces learners to the
content covered in the ISC2 Certified in Cybersecurity certification exam
outline. The review sessions are led by an authorized ISC2 instructor and
cover the five domains of the entry-level Certified in Cybersecurity
certification. The sessions are designed specifically to help learners prepare
to take the Certified in Cybersecurity exam. Learners have access to the
course for 180 days. The course is available in English, Chinese,
German,\u0026nbsp;Japanese and Spanish.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: Can I take the exam without
starting or completing the education
course?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: Yes, you can take
the exam at any time you feel ready.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: How do I register for the free
exam?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: After you have
become an ISC2 Candidate, you will gain access to a promo code as part of ISC2
Candidate benefits. Once you obtain the code from the \u003ca rel=\"noopener
noreferrer\" href=\"https://my.isc2.org/s/Candidate-Benefits/1MCC-exam-
instructions\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eCandidate Benefits\u003c/a\u003e page:
\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul\u003e\r\n \u003cli\u003eVisit \u003ca
rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" href=\"https://my.isc2.org/s/ISC2-Pearson\"
target=\"_blank\"\u003ehttps://my.isc2.org/s/ISC2-Pearson\u003c/a\u003e to
create your exam account with Pearson VUE, global administrator of ISC2
exams.You will be prompted to affirm the accuracy of this information before
submitting the form. Upon submission, your account will be created with
Pearson VUE and you will be on their site.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n
\u003cli\u003eSelect the certification: CC: Certified in
Cybersecurity.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n \u003cli\u003eSelect your testing location
and schedule your exam.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n \u003cli\u003eEnter promo code
you\u0026rsquo;ve obtained from the \u003ca rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"
href=\"https://my.isc2.org/s/Candidate-Benefits/1MCC-exam-instructions\"
target=\"_blank\"\u003eCandidate Benefits\u003c/a\u003e
page.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eNote: The promo code
is redeemable for one registration per person only. You must be an ISC2
Candidate to redeem the code. Once you\u0026rsquo;re registered to sit for
free using the promo code, all future CC registrations in your name must be
purchased at cost.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: I already have an ISC2
certification or am an Associate of ISC2. Can I participate in this free
program?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: No. This One
Million Certified in Cybersecurity pledge is intended to bring new individuals
into the field of cybersecurity and provide them with their first
certification. Therefore, the program is not available for anyone who already
holds an ISC2 certification or the Associate of ISC2 status. However, if would
like to take the CC exam, or course, you may do so by purchasing a \u003ca
href=\"/landing/cc-bundles\"\u003eCC
bundle\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: What do I need to know about exam
day?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: This exam follows all
standard ISC2 exam policies and practices, including rescheduling and special
accommodations. Learn more \u003ca href=\"/exams\"\u003ehere\u003c/a\u003e. It
is recommended that all candidates review these policies and procedures prior
to sitting for the exam.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: What topics are covered in the
course and on the exam?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA:
There are five domains to this certification, listed below. For more details
on the exam, review the \u003ca href=\"/certifications/cc/cc-certification-
exam-outline\"\u003eISC2 Certified in Cybersecurity exam
outline\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul\u003e\r\n
\u003cli\u003eSecurity Principles\u003c/li\u003e\r\n \u003cli\u003eBusiness
Continuity (BC), Disaster Recovery (DR) \u0026amp; Incident Response
Concepts\u003c/li\u003e\r\n \u003cli\u003eAccess Controls
Concepts\u003c/li\u003e\r\n \u003cli\u003eNetwork Security\u003c/li\u003e\r\n
\u003cli\u003eSecurity
Operations\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: How long is the
exam?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: The exam contains
100 multiple choice test items in a standard, linear exam format. There is a
two (2) hour maximum administration time that is inclusive of all optional
breaks and information screens.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: Can I skip a test item on the
exam and answer it later?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA:
No. All items must be answered in the order they are presented. You cannot
skip an exam item and return to it later.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: How will I know if I pass the
exam?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: You will receive a
pass or fail result on-site at the test center upon completion of the exam. If
you pass, you will receive a confirmation email with your next steps to
complete the certification process.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: If I do not pass the exam the
first time, can I take it again for
free?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: No. You are only
permitted one free attempt at the CC exam through the One Million Certified in
Cybersecurity pledge. If you would like to attempt the exam again, we
recommend purchasing a training bundle and exam together. You can see the
available options at \u003ca href=\"/cc-bundles\" class=\"utm-
tag\"\u003eCertified in Cybersecurity bundles
page\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: Can I take the exam
online?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: The entry-level
Certified in Cybersecurity certification exam will only be available in-person
at ISC2-authorized \u003ca rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"
href=\"https://home.pearsonvue.com/isc2\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ePearson VUE
test centers\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: Is the exam available
worldwide?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: You can find
the entry-level Certified in Cybersecurity certification exam at
ISC2-authorized \u003ca rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"
href=\"https://home.pearsonvue.com/isc2\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ePearson VUE
test centers\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: Is the exam available in multiple
languages?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: The entry-level
Certified in Cybersecurity certification exam is currently available in
English, Simplified Chinese, German, Japanese, Korean and
Spanish.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: Can I transfer my free course
and/or exam registration to someone
else?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: No, the course
training and corresponding exam registration are issued to you. You may,
however, encourage your peers to take advantage of the One Million Certified
in Cybersecurity initiative by becoming ISC2
Candidates.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: What are the requirements to
maintain the Certified in Cybersecurity certification after passing the
exam?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: Certified in
Cybersecurity credential holders will need to earn 45 CPE credits during their
three-year certification cycle to maintain the certification. We recommend
earning 15 credits per year. You will also need to pay an Annual Maintenance
Fee to maintain your certification.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: What is the fee and when do I
need to start paying for
it?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: The Annual Maintenance
Fee (AMF) for Certified in Cybersecurity is U.S. $50. This is due upon
certification and annually upon your certification
anniversary.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: Who can I contact if I still have
questions?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: If you have
additional questions about the exam process or registration, please contact
\u003ca
href=\"mailto:ExamAdministration@isc2.org\"\u003eExamAdministration@isc2.org\u003c/a\u003e.
If your questions are regarding ISC2 membership, please reach out to \u003ca
href=\"mailto:membersupport@isc2.org\"\u003eMemberSupport@isc2.org\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: As an employer, what does it mean
if a job candidate has this
certification?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA: Those who
pass this exam have proven their knowledge, skills and abilities in the
fundamentals of cybersecurity. They have a proficient understanding of
policies and processes and have demonstrated their commitment to further
cybersecurity education and development.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: Is there an age restriction to
take an ISC2 examination?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA:
You must be 16 years old to sit for an ISC2
examination.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003chr
/\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eQ: Why is ISC2 offering an entry-
level certification?\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eA:
Research from ISC2 and others continues to conclude that there is a global
shortage of qualified cybersecurity professionals. While there are many
contributing factors, we believe one solution is to create a certification
that enables candidates \u0026ndash; including students, young professionals
and career-changers \u0026ndash; to demonstrate to employers their familiarity
with foundational cybersecurity concepts as determined by cybersecurity
professionals and practitioners already in the
field.\u003c/p\u003e"}}}],"isAccordionOpen":{"value":false},"title":{"value":"FAQ's"}}}],"cta":{"value":{"href":""}},"backgroundGradient":null,"contentHexColor":null}},{"uid":"2cff577f-e40d-459b-88f8-2284d6906596","componentName":"PageScripts","dataSource":"{BED4AA31-1C46-449C-8F11-FFA25F56E0CC}","fields":{"scriptData":{"value":"\u003cdiv
